name: Fastest Food Delivery
description:
You're a young man trying to earn easy money. So you decided to go through the delivery driver route. After a while you realise that you hat your job but don't want to quit because of the money. So you do your job terribly. How? Well it's easy. You throw the customers food out of your window. 

Race through a small village delivering foods like: Pizza, Chicken or Burgers. Or alternatively you can go on a free drive just to get your grips with the village you're delivering in.

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD AND MOUSE:

Player Controls:

WASD: Move player about

Car Controls:

Space: Drive

Left Shift: Reverse

A And D: Turn left and right

Mouse Movement: Looking around

Left Mouse Button: Throw food out of your window

Escape Key: Pause

XBOX CONTROLLER (PREFERRED)

Player Controls:

Left stick: Move player about

Car Controls:

Right Trigger: Drive 

Left Trigger: Reverse

Left Stick left and right: Turn left and right

Right Stick: Looking around

X Button: Throw food out of your window

Menu Button: Pause
